metadata.title: CVE-2015-5400 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Squid before 3.5.6 does not properly handle CONNECT method peer responseswhen configured with cache_peer, which allows remote attackers to bypassintended restrictions and gain access to a backend proxy via a CONNECTrequest.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
